嵀字的基本解释

嵀
zhù
〔天嵀〕同“天柱”，山名，中国山东、安徽、陕西等省均有。

嵀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》直主切，上麌，澄。］
山名用字。

嵀字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵀； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页316第02
【廣韻】直主切【集韻】重主切，?音紵。天嵀，山名。

嵀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嵀字的起名意思

暂无。

嵀
Basic explanation of words
嵀
zhù
〔天嵀〕Same as "Tianzhu", the name of the mountain is found in Shandong, Anhui, Shaanxi and other provinces of China.
嵀
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
["Guangyun" is straight and the main cut, the upper head, the clear. ]
The name of the mountain is written in words.
嵀
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵀; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 316 No. 02
[Guang Yun] Straight to the main cut [Ji Yun] Focus on the main cut,? Sound. Tian嵀, the name of the mountain.
